pscontent.name: ./pscontent
pscontent.value: You have successfully booked your Vida ACPA.

psorderdetailssubtext.name: ./psorderdetailssubtext
psorderdetailssubtext.value: Details of the same has been sent to your email and phone no.

pslaunchdetailsmessage.name: ./pslaunchdetailsmessage
pslaunchdetailsmessage.value: The product delivers in 2 months from order processing*

pslaunchdetailsinfo.name: ./pslaunchdetailsinfo
pslaunchdetailsinfo.value: You can also use your phone number to login again and check your delivery status

psdisclaimersubtext.name: ./psdisclaimersubtext
psdisclaimersubtext.value: *Delivery dates may change if there are any delays in providing information

ppmessage.name: ./ppmessage
ppmessage.value: You have successfully saved your Vida ACPA.

psoderdetailssubtext.name: ./psoderdetailssubtext
psoderdetailssubtext.value: Your details have been captured, you can visit the selected store and complete the process. After which your order will be processed further.

psconfirmationtitle.name: ./psconfirmationtitle
psconfirmationtitle.value: The order will be confirmed once payment is complete

psconfirmationinfo.name: ./psconfirmationinfo
psconfirmationinfo.value: You can also use your phone number to login again and check your delivery status

paymentfailuremessage.name: ./paymentfailuremessage
paymentfailuremessage.value: The payment failed due to a technical error. If your money was debited, you should get the refund within the next 24 hrs.

dsnomineeinfomessage.name: ./dsnomineeinfomessage
dsnomineeinfomessage.value: To complete your insurance details we need your nominee details

dsconfirmationpopuptittle.name: ./dsconfirmationpopuptittle
dsconfirmationpopuptittle.value: Your order will not be processed until you complete these details
